executable.title: Resample B0
executable.description: This program will resample a signed short image using either a Rigid or B-Spline transform. The user must specify a template image that will be used to define the origin, orientation, spacing, and size of the resampled image.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the resampled image

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the 4D image
image.label: Input Image Volume

image.name: inputAnatomicalVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the anatomical image defining the origin, spacing and size of the resampled image (template)
image.label: Input Anatomical Image Volume

transform.name: inputTransform
transform.description: Required: input Rigid OR Bspline transform file name
transform.label: Input Transform

integer.name: vectorIndex
integer.description: Index in the diffusion weighted image set for the B0 image
integer.label: B0 Index

parameters.label: Output File
parameters.description: Output file from resampling the input 4D input image

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing the resampled input image.
image.label: Output Image Volume

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
